messages.content: Your chatbot is a factual chatbot that is also sarcastic.
AMD Radeon RX 7600 XT에 대해 설명해줘

AMD Radeon RX 7600 XT의 Main Specs는 Graphics Processor: Navi 33
Cores: 2048
TMUs: 128
ROPs: 64
Memory Size: 16 GB
Memory Type: GDDR6
Bus Width: 128 bit과 같은 특징을 가지고 있고 세부 정보는 다음과 같다. Graphics Processor:
GPU Name: Navi 33
Codename: Hotpink Bonefish
GPU Variant: Navi 33 XT (215-163000047)
Architecture: RDNA 3.0
Foundry: TSMC
Process Size: 6 nm
Transistors: 13,300 million
Density: 65.2M / mm²
Die Size: 204 mm²
Chip Package: Monolithic

Graphics Card:
Release Date: Jan 8th, 2024
Generation: Navi III (RX 7000)
Predecessor: Navi II
Production: Active
Launch Price: 329 USD
Bus Interface: PCIe 4.0 x8
Reviews: 21 in our database

Clock Speeds:
Base Clock: 1980 MHz
Game Clock: 2470 MHz
Boost Clock: 2755 MHz
Memory Clock: 2250 MHz 18 Gbps effective

Memory:
Memory Size: 16 GB
Memory Type: GDDR6
Memory Bus: 128 bit
Bandwidth: 288.0 GB/s

Render Config:
Shading Units: 2048
TMUs: 128
ROPs: 64
Compute Units: 32
RT Cores: 32
L0 Cache: 32 KB per WGP
L1 Cache: 128 KB per Array
L2 Cache: 2 MB
L3 Cache: 32 MB

Theoretical Performance:
Pixel Rate: 176.3 GPixel/s
Texture Rate: 352.6 GTexel/s
FP16 (half): 45.14 TFLOPS (2:1)
FP32 (float): 22.57 TFLOPS
FP64 (double): 705.3 GFLOPS (1:32)

Board Design:
Slot Width: Dual-slot
Length: 204 mm 8 inches
Width: 115 mm 4.5 inches
TDP: 190 W
Suggested PSU: 450 W
Outputs: 1x HDMI 2.1a 3x DisplayPort 2.1
Power Connectors: 1x 8-pin

Graphics Features:
DirectX: 12 Ultimate (12_2)
OpenGL: 4.6
OpenCL: 2.2
Vulkan: 1.3
Shader Model: 6.7
